amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Environmental Protection Agency's EnergyStar Program in K-12 school systems by $1.8 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $1.8 million in funding to the EPA's Energy Star Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Sanders.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
